sentences.en: After a period of enforced idleness, she found a new job.
sentences.cn: 她在被迫闲散了一段时间之后，找到了份新工作。

sentences.en: At this moment she was the image of a victim of idleness.
sentences.cn: 在这一间,她完全是一副颓唐消沉的样子.

sentences.en: Braccio was a hater of idleness.
Business may be troublesome, but idleness is pernicious.
sentences.cn: 事业虽扰人, 怠惰害更大.
闲着不干事他可受不了.

sentences.en: He was tired of rotting from idleness at Rome.
sentences.cn: 他呆在罗马,无所事事,对于一切都十分厌倦.

sentences.en: I don't like to moon away this Sunday in idleness.
sentences.cn: 我不愿意无所事事地度过这个星期天.

sentences.en: Idleness enervates the will to succeed.
sentences.cn: 懒惰削弱了成功的决心.

sentences.en: Idleness is a very bad thing for human nature.
sentences.cn: 懒散是人性中很糟糕的一面。

sentences.en: It is above the common mass , above idleness, above want, above insignificance.
sentences.cn: 这是超出一般人 、 超出懒散、超出贫困 、 值得重视的事情.

sentences.en: It was a bore to train, and it interfered with his idleness.
sentences.cn: 训练使他腻烦, 不合他懒散的性格.

sentences.en: The closure of the large factory made many workers live in idleness.
sentences.cn: 那家大工厂的关闭使许多工人失业.

sentences.en: The school boy took it ill that the teacher reproved him for idleness.
sentences.cn: 这个小学生心里不痛快,因为老师责备他不用功.

sentences.en: They were condemned to spend a fortnight of idleness at that lonely island.
sentences.cn: 他们被迫在那个孤岛上待了两个星期.

sentences.en: This suited her very well as she had no taste for idleness.
sentences.cn: 这对她很合适,因为她从不喜欢游手好闲.

sentences.en: We became suspended in some stately never-never land of pleasure, luxury and idleness.
sentences.cn: 我们流连忘返大气、奢华、惬意、闲适的世外桃源。

words.tran_cn: 无所事事地；懒惰地，空闲地；无益地
懒汉；游手好闲的人；[机] 惰轮；中间齿轮

trans.tran_cn: 懒惰，闲散，无益，无效，失业
